items.summary: Add a backend Motoko function `addBalanceToUser(userId: Principal, amount: Nat) â†’ Result` (admin-only) that allows the admin to directly credit a specified amount (in paise/smallest unit) to any user's balance. The function must reject calls from non-admin principals.

Add a TanStack Query mutation hook `useAddBalanceToUser` in `frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts` that calls the backend `addBalanceToUser` function. On success, invalidate the relevant balance/user queries. Follow the same pattern as existing mutation hooks in that file.

Add an 'Add Balance' section or tab to the existing Admin Dashboard page (`frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx`). It must include a principal input field, an amount input field (in INR), and a 'Add Balance' submit button. On submit, call `useAddBalanceToUser` and display a success or error toast. Apply the existing BharatSMM dark navy/orange-red theme consistently.
